ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: DarkMouse:; Well, KitKat has done nothing but good for me. She hasn t tried to turn me over to Megatron when he was in her base. And Aracnia knows I m here,

DarkMouse:;

"Well, KitKat has done nothing but good for me. She hasn't tried to 
turn me over to Megatron when he was in her base. And Aracnia knows 
I'm here, as well as Megatron. But I that Megatron, Aracnia and 
Hellbeast are all too worried about getting the Allience, more than 
slagging us. If you want, we can stick together and watch out for 
each other. I don't trust Megatron any more than you do. He 
sacrificed us and didn't care. But KitKat is alright. Well, so far 
anyway. She really watches out for her group. It's wierd, but 
sometimes, she acts more like a maximal than a predacon."

She looked down for a moment, then back up at Quickstrike. "Look, no 
matter what happens, I'm sticking with you. OK? Your the only one I 
really trust. So let's just look out for each other. OK?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Quickstrike:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> "We can talk t' Black Arachnia," he said to Dark Mouse. "That's one 
> thing. Ah don't trust Megatron anymore at all. KitKat---ah don't 
> know, she might be loyal. Whaddya think? Ah all know is ah don't 
like 
> this. Not at all. It's makin' mah nerves go again. Hell Beast an' 
> Megatron ain't uh good combination. Ah hate Hell Beast more than ah 
> do Megatron. Hell Beast could kill ya fer lookin' at 'im uh funny 
> way. Ya can try an' kick his kiester all ya want, but ah can't. 
He'll 
> do somethin' personal if ah do."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > DarkMouse::
> > 
> > She stood up and looked at Quickstrike. "Yeah, I know. It all 
> smells 
> > fishy to me too. But what can we do? We can't run, we can't just 
> > leave them either. KitKat is a friend. She was  friend when I was 
> > with Megatron. She's the only one that hasn't betrayed me. And 
I'm 
> > thinking right, she's still your friend to." she said, looking up 
> at 
> > Quickstrike. She knew she was right. What bothered her was the 
fact 
> > that she still had feeling for Quickstrike. She also knew that he 
> > didn't give a care about her, much.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> > > Quickstrike:
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Quickstrike leaned back. "Ah don't need yer protection." He 
> looked 
> > > back at Dark Mouse. He needed to talk to Black Aracnia about 
this 
> > as 
> > > soon as he could get to her.
> > > 
> > > He got out with the others as the pod landed. He gave Dark 
Mouse 
> > and 
> > > glance.
